evidence.claim: Oblicore employs AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The platform supports HL7 and FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Oblicore integrates with Kafka for event streaming services.
Oblicore addresses compliance with HIPAA regulations for health tech applications.
Uses Azure for scalability and performance enhancements.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of use cases related to X12 or healthcare clearinghouse services found.
